items.summary: The next era of generative AI

links.label: Gridscale X Protection Data Manager Handle growing volumes of protection data efficiently. Our software automates relay data imports, saving up to 80% of time, increasing accuracy, and providing a single source of truth for grid stability.

Dynamic Line Rating Gridscale X Dynamic Line Rating calculates line capacity in real-time using local weather data. Increase capacity by 10-15% over 90% of the time, reduce redispatching costs, and bridge capacity gaps.

Dynamic Security Assessment Transport 30% more power through existing lines. Our automated software provides real-time stability assessments to increase grid capacity, improve situational awareness, and prevent blackouts. Push your grid limits securely.

Advanced Distribution Management Manage grid complexity and the energy transition. Spectrum Power ADMS integrates DERs, visualizes processes, and optimizes assets across all voltage levels to ensure reliable power, reduce costs, and boost efficiency.

Gridscale X LV Management Handle outages up to 30% faster and cut model maintenance time in half with Gridscale X LV Management. This smart co-pilot SaaS provides guided workflows to enhance grid stability, optimize assets, and resupply power faster.

Network Model Manager Unleash network model management with Gridscale X. Our fast, scalable, and open platform provides a single source of truth for grid data. Keep models consistent, boost team productivity, and accelerate planning and operations.

PSS E The industry benchmark for transmission planning and analysis. PSS®E delivers trusted results and unmatched automation. Save time and streamline complex workflows with over 2,000+ open Python™ APIs.

PSS SINCAL PSS®SINCAL is an all-in-one simulation software for electric and pipe networks. Reliably plan expansions, analyze protection, and integrate renewables across LV, MV, and HV systems with fast, accurate calculations.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management Simplify metering with our scalable, vendor-agnostic MDM. Automate data operations, resolve 99.9% of issues, and improve billing accuracy. Get the job done 85% faster and future-proof your utility against vendor lock-in.

Gridscale X Prepay Gridscale X Prepay protects utility revenue with a central wallet for real-time rating, flexible tariffs & debt recovery. This improves cash flow while empowering consumers with budget control & self-service.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management SaaS Manage electric, water, and gas meter data with our vendor-agnostic MDM SaaS. Avoid vendor lock-in, increase billing accuracy, and reduce TCO. Deploy 3x faster with a scalable, secure, and future-proof cloud solution.

Gridscale X Meter Data Management for Water A vendor-agnostic MDM for water utilities. Process smart meter data to detect leaks, backflow, and theft, reducing revenue loss. Our scalable solution ensures future-proof operations and avoids vendor lock-in.

Gridscale X LV Insights Gridscale X LV Insights is a SaaS that creates a Digital Twin of your LV grid. Automate model creation to improve data quality by 90%, identify critical segments, and make confident investment decisions.

GRIDSCALE X DER Insights Gridscale X DER Insights uncovers BTM DERs and their grid impact using an accurate model. Make data-driven decisions to prioritize upgrades, prevent issues, and fully leverage DER flexibility.
How AI manages building and data center systems

Gridscale X Advanced Protection Assessment Power accurate protection simulations with the world's largest library of 7,300+ detailed relay models. Automate wide-area coordination and streamline NERC compliance for enhanced grid reliability.
